issue.subject: Extend filters "period of time"
issue.description:
In Backend, current dashboard offers filters on "organism" and "predefined time period" (last 7 days, last month etc...) as seen below.
!screenshot 2015-05-19 14-36-56.png!


The need is to add filters based on predefined years (2015, 2014 , 2013...) as it was suggested in easySDI users's day in frebruary 2015.

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: I suggest to extend current filter list "period of time" with years and seperate the two type of items with a "------" separator

journals.notes: This feature should be also added in dashboard front-end (when it will be available - see #651).
